column4: how can i configure startx to inicialize fluxbow like default x-window ?
how can i configure startx to inicialize fluxbox like default x-window ?
What do you mean "like default x-window" ?
yes
Do you just want it to be the default window manager?
yes
to be possible started with startx command... understand?
when i type startx here, gnome is loaded, and i has installed the fluxbox, is very small.. and i want if possible, change startx to start fluxbox
its possible?
Yes
how can i do this?
I don't remember exactly, you might try reading "man startx" or check wiki.ubuntu.com
Can you pastebin the output of "sudo dd if=/dev/sdX count=1 | od" where sdX is your flash drive.
I got told to do: dd if=/your/image of=/whole/usb/device
That will destroy all data currently on the flash drive.
dosn't matter.
I have a backup :-)
It also won't work with most iso files.
OH.. ok.
http://pastebin.com/8Kp2jexa
Ok, that's clearly wrong for a bootable drive.
thats after I did the abow dd command.
